_source.text: After completing my master thesis, for the past one month i was learning Naiad.At first it was a bit tricky to learn those operators and later i found it to be Easier and better than Realflow as Naiad uses FLIP and DEFLIP Particles whereas Realflow uses SPH particles.Moreover the UI reminds me Houdini which has a Node Based workflow.The simple dambreak example that is provided on the Exotic matter site provides a good introduction on Naiad Bodies.
